column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I've been there several times
column2: and it's okay. The biscuits and gravy are the best thing I've had- lots of sage
column3: lots of flavor. I think the biggest problem is the syrup is of poor quality
column4: and it downplays the pancakes. I'd choose to go 10 minutes up the street to the original pancake house
column5: over coming here any day. Get there early
